website_summaries.verdict: Middle-of-the-road for both size and price, and it's one of the only units on the market that offers adjustable temperature controls.
pros: Oversized, reinforced steel tank offers full ankle and wrist coverage
Removable slanted foot grate provides ergonomic foot positioning and acts as a filter
cons: Broke in months for some customers

customer_reviews.title: I have had this item for just over 1 year ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for just over 1 year. I have used it about 8 times. It stopped working. The power does not come on. I am very disappointed in this item.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Best Gigi Wax I've tried
customer_reviews.text: First time using this particular flavor of wax from Gigi for leg and bikini. I tried this after failing to find the alternative brand that is my go to wax. Was pleasantly surprised. There was much less breaking than I have received with other Gigi wax's. I have lighter color hair that isn't too course so breakage is a problem. I hate feeling like I have to tweeze my legs 2 days after I spend time waxing them. I didn't get that with this particular flavor of Gigi wax. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Poopiepnts

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had worked as stated as the dipping area was a great size.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't heat up to the temperatures that it said it would. I tried to different units and tested them both with 2 different candy thermometers that were tested by placing them in boiling water. Wish it had worked as stated as the dipping area was a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Hannon

customer_reviews.title: Love this wax bath soooo much
customer_reviews.text: Love this wax bath soooo much! I work in construction and use my wax bath every night to keep my hands soft and not cracked. The variable temp and standby functions are great. I had three different (cheaper) wax baths over the years and finally decided to invest in a more professional model, and I am very glad I did. The aloe infused wax is also delightful. My father and my daughter also enjoy using it as well. It has a low enough temp as to not burn her 6 year old hands and the bath is big enough to accommodate Grandpa's huge hands!
customer_reviews.author: lilamanda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Heats up evenly. Easy to use. "Keep warm" feature is nice. Good quality electrical cord seems safer than some competitors. I like the stainless feature. I also like that it blinks when still warming up so that I can tell at a quick glance whether it's ready or not. Heated to the right temp. Not too hot, not too cold.
customer_reviews.author: Plummy

customer_reviews.title: Best all purpose use product
customer_reviews.text: First let me say I am a licensed Cosmetologist. It helps to know how to use a product. This product, if used correctly, is fantastic! All of the negative reviews I have read are all based on human error. I have been using this product on sensitive skin for years. Their formula is fantastic for all purpose use and this extra large container is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great way to clean and open pores before waxing.
customer_reviews.text: This pre-epilation cleanser helps open pores and get hair ready to be pulled. As someone who cant stand the cost of a bikini wax, but, also struggles to wax oneself... this stuff HELPS ALOT. I love that you don't wash it off- its helpful to have a product to rub in, dry off, and go. It also smells fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Helen K

customer_reviews.title: awesome. WARNING
customer_reviews.text: Ooo, Aaahhhh, wow, awesome.WARNING. The bath cools and wax solidifies making transporting a breeze. The problem is trying to pry it from my mother-in-law's 90-year-old fingers.Heeehee
customer_reviews.author: cboliver

customer_reviews.title: IMPOSSIBLE TO GET OFF OF YOU!
customer_reviews.text: I HAD TO GET MINERAL SPIRITS FROM THE WORKBENCH IN ORDER TO GET THIS STUFF OFF, IMPOSSIBLE TO MANAGE, or USE WITH STRIPS. It gets on everything else it touches, and you cannot remove it. Completely sticky stuff. I threw this can out.
customer_reviews.author: chris heato

customer_reviews.title: Okay removal. Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to remove. Havmt quite gotten the solution for excess or any thats fallen on any surface if its hard surface scraping is best if it isnt like material its impossible to get out. I like it generally because my skin doesnt have a bad reaction to it which is awesome because i have extremely sensitive skin. However, it sometimes doesnt get all the hair i have course hair and will have to pluck myself in areas after waxing 2x.
customer_reviews.author: Caraveo Fam.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have coarse thick hair. I used it on my face, under arms and legs....I didn't take any hair with it!! Only thing it's good for is making my bathroom smell like chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: DirtandDeath

customer_reviews.title: Wax melted over
customer_reviews.text: I received my wax as anticipated, however, the wax had melted over the top of the container during shipping (assumed since it is summer and has been 90+ degrees). Is there any way I can use this container of wax without ruining my wax warmer machine? I saw this happened to someone else in the reviews but figured I would take a chance since I love GiGi products.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy I made the choice to get the bigger bath
customer_reviews.text: Oh man! Everyone in my family now wants one. I wasn't convinced until I tried it myself. We use it to soothe our hands after work. I'm happy I made the choice to get the bigger bath. It is big enough to use as a foot bath if I wanted to. The paraffin that comes with it is just enough to fill to minimum fill line and smells wonderful. It does take a bit of time to heat but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: pnrvasquez

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: Got this wax thinking it will work on thick hair. It work well on my forehead and eyebrows but did not got any hair from my sideburns. I feel the description of this item was misleading and yes, it is very watery but I could deal with that if it will do what it is supposed to do. Money wasted
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort for Hands and Feet
customer_reviews.text: I love wax warmer. It makes my hands and feet feel so good. It takes a couple of hours to heat up. If you know that, you can plan accordingly. Cold weather means painful hands and this has really helped. There is a pleasant tingling which I suspect is increased circulation. Afterward my hands and feet feel really soft. It seems to help with calluses.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Lady

customer_reviews.title: Espresso worked better than All Purpose Honey
customer_reviews.text: always used All Purpose Honey from GIGI, but this time got this espresso one. I gotta say that this one works much better, easier to spread and removes with much more ease.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Abdugafurov

customer_reviews.title: My best buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it’s the one my nail salon uses. Now I can pamper myself as often as I want. The benefit of having my own paraffin bath is I can use it on my hands, elbows and feet. It’s so great for softening my skin and a great pain reliever too. I love it!!!😍
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Sewer

customer_reviews.title: Goopy mess
customer_reviews.text: This was a goopy mess. It stuck to everything and removed no hair. It melted fine in my wax warmer, but seemed to only stick to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: apbrandt

customer_reviews.title: Do bother
customer_reviews.text: Do not order! The reviews are very much accurate. The wax’s comes half way spilt out. When you use it the wax doesn’t remove all hair. It only works well with facial nothing more. Make sure it’s hot enough if not you won’t be able to pull off all the wax and that just hurts and gets you irritated
customer_reviews.author: Momlife4

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetology Student Review
customer_reviews.text: This is a brand we use in school, I have very sensative skin and it is very gentle. I am allergic to many fragrances and my skin reddened easy. Do get the wax off it is also gentle and I use it on myself and in school.
customer_reviews.author: Amoreena Jasper

customer_reviews.title: So Soothing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for at home wax treatments. I have painfully stiff joints in my hands and this wax warmer was the answer I was looking for. The hot wax soothes my joints better than anything else I've tried. Plus it stores easily under my bathroom sink so I can pull it our whenever I need it. Wax treatments are my favorite part of the mani/pedi and now I can do them at home (for much cheaper) whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: Mama-Razzi

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR BRAZILIAN
customer_reviews.text: It smells delicious, but not for brazilian, it is too soft for it. Good for legs, arms, body in general, but not for brazilian. Doesn't hurt, but left a lot of hear in the pelvic area...
customer_reviews.author: Violeta

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate wax
customer_reviews.text: smells amazing and makes the skin soft. Messier in appearance then the lighter wax.
customer_reviews.author: gumby4yoga

customer_reviews.title: the best wax for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin, so waxing hasn't been easy. This wax is perfect , doesnt rip my skin off and only leaves minor irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Czarinatecklah

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wax, because it said it’s good in removing coarse hair, NOT! This does not remove my coarse hair
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for personal home use for myself. So far it is fantastic. It is everything that I expected. With covid-19 still going strong I stopped my professional pedi.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Nelms

customer_reviews.title: Favorite wax
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this style of wax for years with my warmer.
customer_reviews.author: girl99

customer_reviews.title: Fake product / defective product
customer_reviews.text: The product that was send was fake . It had a black charcoal like texture and skin was burning and the hairs were not getting removed . Have been using this for years and never had this experience . Looks like it is a fake and it is dangerous for use and have skin burns
customer_reviews.author: Achi

customer_reviews.title: Less stickier, and smoother than the honey wax
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this product. I have been using gigi all purpose wax for years. Tried this chocolate wax and liked it over the honey wax. It’s less stickier, smoother, and doesn’t get too hot, hence doesn’t peel off skin. Only caution is to use it when the wax has melted properly else can get a bit difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: pk399

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using several times a day to help with ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using several times a day to help with arthritis pain in my hands. Seems to help and leaves skin very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri M.

customer_reviews.title: Hot...mess :(
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Heard great reviews about this product and received a can full of dents and leaking wax from the top. You can see it's still sealed from the pictures. *I happened to be getting home right when my order arrived so it was not a matter of being left outside too long.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works well smells yummy
customer_reviews.text: This works really well at removing leg hair, facial hair, etc. I love the coffee scent and that it's easy to apply. I will be getting this again. The can isn't sealed, other than the plastic lid and in hot months it can leak but they had it wrapped in plastic and I had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Phippin

customer_reviews.title: Why smell like wax when you can smell like chocolate espresso
customer_reviews.text: It says espresso but it kind of smells like chocolate. Maybe tootsie pop. Regardless it smells amazing and I prefer it over any other honey wax. I use it on face, back and those areas down there.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. We use it at my Salon but, decided to purchase one at home for home use. Sad to say it was all spilled over when I recieved it
customer_reviews.author: Lisette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of my clients say they hardly feel a thing when I used this wax. It's VERY gentle and causes little to no redness. They love the smell too!
customer_reviews.author: nancy ormsby

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Product is now cold, in the box and did not last three or four times. It plugs in and it won’t turn on now and heat up the wax. Poorly made product. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: David E Arrowsmith

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to soften my hands and decrease skin from cracking due to lots of hand washing and sanitizing at work. This paraffin bath does the trick and is therapeutically soothing to the joints in my hand. Bath is large enough to use on my feet (I wear a size 7). Variable heat settings makes finding a comfortable temperature easy. Love the standby mode so you don't have to wait hours for wax to melt when you want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: APG

customer_reviews.title: It does not work
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good product. I decided to give a chance to this brand and it sucks. It is not easy to remove, it went through the wax strip and it did not remove the hair and irritates skin. Smells very good but quality is very poor. Not recommend it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Alberto Vargas Angel

customer_reviews.title: Smells good..
customer_reviews.text: My wife koves the smell but she said the last stuff was better... will have to look it up. This stuff i sticky and drippy.
customer_reviews.author: TYB FET

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the product is packed tightly with no leakage.
customer_reviews.text: I am actually not happy by the way the product got delivered , the seal got broken and all the wax came out of tin . But then I generally use this product it is very good for my skin . It’s a best products just because the seal got broken I have no choice other than trash .
customer_reviews.author: Swathi

customer_reviews.title: Great on my skin!
customer_reviews.text: Smells just like chocolate!!! Was very excited to use this product and I was very satisfied with the results. It really works great and it’s gentle on my skin. I loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Repairs?
customer_reviews.text: Love my Gigi paraffin wax warmer! I received this as a gift from my parents for Christmas . The only problems I am having in now that I have had it right at 5 months it has quit working it won't come on or anything and I have no idea what to do? Worked perfect up til now?
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had the digital GiGi Paraffin wax spa for one year now. I absolutely LOVE it. The quality of the unit has been outstanding. The wax melts very quickly (sooner than what the pamphlet states). I like that I can adjust the temperature of the wax. I have used the spa for both my hands and feet for arthritis and it offers much relief. I have recommended this unit to several of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: MY BOTTLE LOOKED USED
customer_reviews.text: THE PACKAGE ARRIVED SUPER FAST, I'M JUST NOT HAPPY THAT MY BOTTLE WAS SHIPPED OPENED THE CLEAR SEAL WRAP WAS OPEN AND IT WAS LEAKING. THE PICTURE IS EXACTLY HOW THE BOTTLE WAS WHEN I OPENED THE BOX. I'M USING THIS WITH MY HARD WAX FROM CIREPIL
customer_reviews.author: yashyra17

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Great for people with sensitive skin, must have for waxes.
customer_reviews.author: Oded.p

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Not the worst
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be applied very thin. Any generous amount will not attach to strips. Doesn't leave any bruising on skin therefore it remains one of my top 3 choices of wax for my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Same as cream wax.I loved the way chocolate wax works the ones I ordered from amazon it’s not same this is way more lighter then the original chocolate wax means the one I buy from beauty supplies it works great. But the one from Amazon not good .
customer_reviews.author: pawanjeet kaur

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful soft wax, safe on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Melted beautifully, great consistency, spread like a dream and got ALL THE HAIRS. Definitely a soft wax to use with muslin/other cloth strips. I was concerned about the coffee infusion, but my sensitive skin had no reaction. If anything, the coffee added a great fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C

customer_reviews.title: Smells like gasoline
customer_reviews.text: The stuff stinks. It smells like gasoline, I am very disappointed. I honestly question the authenticity of the product I received because it’s hard to believe a known brand like this would sell a product with such a foul smell
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Karoumy

customer_reviews.title: Open bottle when arrived
customer_reviews.text: I received the item open and damaged. Unfortunately there are no returns on this product. I haven’t used the product itself yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.. does not work and leaves marks on your skin
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! It rips your skin off too and leaves blood clot marks. Its super sticky and hard to pull off your skin. It doesnt go away easily too. It took a week for me to clean my kitchen counter where I spilled a lil. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: devanshi

customer_reviews.title: First time experience turned out to be excellemt
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing product. I have never waxed on my own but using this my first experience of waxing turned out to be great. Super easy to apply, and take off. Didn't have the after wax serum to take off the stickiness so used veg oil. Overall great experience
customer_reviews.author: POOJA YADAV

customer_reviews.title: This works amazing, and smells even better
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing, and smells even better. What it doesn't do is mix well with carpet... I should say, it mixes way too well with carpet and will probably never come out.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan L

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice and works well
customer_reviews.text: Did what I used it for on my lower legs. Messy stuff, but nail polish remover takes it off inorganic surfaces quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Chey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product numerous times with no problems or issues. But....not sure if they changed how they make this or if I just got a bad one but wax is hard to remove and left skin red, irritated and with a burning sensation
customer_reviews.author: ASUSunDevil1

customer_reviews.title: Great brand. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for awhile. A bottle last so long if its for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Kokodreams

customer_reviews.title: Wax is not well this time
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this wax multiple times and when we just opened it and used it. This particular wax is very sticky and not like it normally is. I did purchase 2 and we will change it out and see how the other one is.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Reedy

customer_reviews.title: I purchase yhis product totally happy!! I recommended to anyone works excelent
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews, I purchase yhis product totally happy!! I recommended to anyone works excelent!! this vendor and company are great as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: No strips and no mess.
customer_reviews.text: I have been seeing videos an Pinterest and wanted to try. Works way better then soft wax. No strips and no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Campa

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: We had this one only about 2 weeks before it quit working. The unit had power bu would not heat up, also cannot figure out how to contact the seller through Amazon to try and get e replacement sent to us. Would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: is bad
customer_reviews.text: The product is very bad 👎 it doesn't work its stinky and liquidy It messed up my nail trying to take it off
customer_reviews.author: Aurines Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: The only thing good about this wax is the smell, the wax is very thick and it does not remove hair very well. Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hall

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged! “ Cannot return”
customer_reviews.text: I received this product damaged and cannot return it. Haven’t used it so cannot tell how it works. I won’t be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: the only thing I don't like is that its a bit oily
customer_reviews.text: This products does what it says it does. I do not need to shave as often, the only thing I don't like is that its a bit oily.
customer_reviews.author: CARLA PAOLA CABRERA

customer_reviews.title: ... waxes before and this one is by far the best! It doesn't hurt nearly as bad as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used other waxes before and this one is by far the best! It doesn't hurt nearly as bad as the other wax does. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Daph&Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It leaked a bit in the bag but besides that the product is good.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It stinks! Yuck! Plus, when I opened the box it had leaked all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: So sticky and really impossible to work with. I've been using wax all my life and this is the worst wax I came across. It somewhat Ok while it's very hot and you are using it but It's HORRIBLE to get off of the skin afterwords and anything else it touches. An absolute sticky disaster!
customer_reviews.author: HZ

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended if you want to wax legs or bikini!
customer_reviews.text: It dried too fast and didn’t stick on the wax strips.
customer_reviews.author: Hasanah Doan

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice!
customer_reviews.text: smells awesome and relaxing good for my normal skin type.
customer_reviews.author: MsJay

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love this product ❤️ Was a great price for the amount of wax I got and lasted me a while. Wish they have it back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Shavonte

customer_reviews.title: amzing
customer_reviews.text: all time favorite for bikini wax and underarms and hurts the least.
customer_reviews.author: KAVISHA

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product....DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product!!! It rips your skin off.It’s super sticky and hard to pull off.It’s quality has been degraded.Leaves a blood clot marks.DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this warmer
customer_reviews.text: Love this warmer! Just remember wait for it to completely warms up and the light shows you cause its too hot if you don't. Great product, don't mind the peach wax. Haven't tried any others yet!
customer_reviews.author: S. Force

customer_reviews.title: A great simple post lotion!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion works fairly well at removing left over wax ( use aesthetics wipes for a cleaner removal vs cotton rounds which will stick to the wax) and the price is low compared to a regular beauty store. The smell was not unpleasant nor was it pleasing just bland ( add some pure essential oils for a scent/healing aid). The lotion was light and goes a long way, while being none greasy. The shipping was fast and packaged nicely, including samples of other products. For the price it did what it was supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Great no spill wax.
customer_reviews.text: Great wax and I"ve tried the other brand thats sold at Sally's and this one turned out to be better and much cleaner with no spills.
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes doing nails and manicures and she just ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes doing nails and manicures and she just loves this item. Also, it was much cheaper than a store that sells it nearby.
customer_reviews.author: TtownMom

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had success with nearly all GiGi waxing products. Waxes, sticks, warmers, all have been nice quality and I've been happy with all my GiGi purchases. This wax smells lovely and does the job. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Christiane M.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find a wax suitable for sensitive skin and this one is a great match. I used it for waxing my arms and legs and it worked so well. Pulled out all hair and didn't feel hot either.
customer_reviews.author: Kartik

customer_reviews.title: Just great!
customer_reviews.text: Works like wax, smells like chocolate. Don't know what it tastes like, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: it makes the waxing process very easy! I usually wax when my hair is really long and I feel much LESS pain that I do with honey wax. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Graziana

customer_reviews.title: Very happy and hairless!
customer_reviews.text: I've been an Esthetician for 12 years and I'm always trying new waxes. I love this stuff. Doesn't leave the skin sticky, takes every hair out at once, is less painful and irritating, and smells delicious-like an expensive coffee candle. It's my standard soft wax of choice!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the formula. And it doesn’t remove the hair like the regular wax
customer_reviews.author: Nakkia pleasant

customer_reviews.title: Best wax I have ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: Best wax for sensitive skin is GiGi chocolate wax and skin feels great after using it
customer_reviews.author: Anusha Chaparala

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I found this product omg. I think this will be my go-to wax from now on because it works great and smells so good I wanna eat it. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Ascel Kadhem

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work. Also package arrived in leaking condition. Had to throw in garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva - Rock ON

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product!
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. It doesn't harden quickly. You have to wait for a really long time for it to harden. I had blood clots all over my hand. Would never recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Soujanya

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: I wish this worked right, was so excited to get this. ski. feels great
customer_reviews.author: JanLynn

customer_reviews.title: Not my favourite wax since it’s too messy
customer_reviews.text: Not my favourite wax since it’s too messy. Painless but literally gets anywhere and doesn’t dry. Totally would go for a hardwax bc it’s easier to work with
customer_reviews.author: nyrulz102

customer_reviews.title: Way too sticky
customer_reviews.text: I have used this wax for YEARS!!! This particular container is SUPER sticky and leaves a horrible residue. Time to try something new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this August 3 and it is no longer working properly. It does not heat properly anymore. I followed instructions and it is only used by me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: leaves your hand and feel so soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Gigi paraffin bath and it work really well, easy to use and lives you hands an feet feeling so soft. love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anabella Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Smells but works
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this product 4 stars because the 5th star would be if it smelled like a lotion, but instead smells like a mechanic shop. The product itself leaves your skin very soft after epilating, but I don't like having to ruin to fresh, clean smell of my skin after showering. What I do now is mix this stinky lotion with lavender oil and coconut oil so it's a bit better smelling. Overall, it served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Luz Schvindt

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT get eight pounds of wax.
customer_reviews.text: Warmer arrived today with only 6 pounds of wax. I was disappointed-- that's two full sleeves of wax that I didn't get. The warmer is light weight and can accommodate a larger foot. The peach wax smells wonderful. Would have given five stars if I hadn't been shorted what the description said I was supposed to receive.
customer_reviews.author: cmh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!!!! Please do not BUY
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this product , the wax is very sticky and doesn't wax properly and its very tedious to take off your body or in case if u drop it on the floor the Stickiness stays forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will only use this wax from now on
customer_reviews.text: The best wax that I have ever used , no mess at all . So happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: saba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love using this wax! My skin feels great after using this!
customer_reviews.author: Sukh

customer_reviews.title: Great wax
customer_reviews.text: I love it....... the smell and how it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaly A

customer_reviews.title: need this with waxing
customer_reviews.text: this is a definite necessity when waxing. nothing feels better then to have this on the worked on areas. and its not messy or super oily, gets into skin real fast and heals the areas rather quickly. keep it in room temperature though...
customer_reviews.author: Comradekiska

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Favorite wax so far! Smells great, goes on smooth, grips well, and skin feels good. I prefer it with the non woven strips vs the cloth strips. Adheres way better and doesn't seep thru.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

product_meta.title: GiGi Digital Paraffin Bath with GiGi Peach Paraffin Wax 6 lbs
product_meta.description: Color:Digital Paraffin BathGiGi Digital Paraffin Bath with GiGi Peach Paraffin Wax 6 lbs
feature_bullets: the GiGi Paraffin Bath comes with perfectly adjustable digital temperature control and quick melt feature
Oversized, reinforced steel tank bath for full ankle and wrist coverage
Designed with a see-through and spill-resistant locking lid for safety and convenience
Built with a removable slanted foot grate that provides an ergonomic foot positioning and acts as a filter
Includes FREE 6 pounds of GiGi Peach Paraffin Wax
